cards.title: Billboard Site Feasibility Checker
cards.notes: Working prototype exists. Phase 1: municipal code database. OUTFRONT IP â€” keep separate from side projects.

cards.title: Phase 1: Municipal code database
cards.notes: Define schema + sources, then ingest. Target: Cook County + collar counties.

cards.title: Site Visit Photo Analyzer
cards.notes: Drop photos from a site visit â†’ AI extracts visibility angle, distance from road, clutter score, estimated dimensions, condition rating. Auto-generates a site score card. Uses vision model â€” no custom training needed.

cards.title: Lease Abstractor
cards.notes: Upload lease PDFs â†’ AI pulls: rent schedule, escalations, termination clauses, renewal options, exclusivity provisions, signage rights. Portfolio-level dashboard of key lease terms. Huge time saver at renewal season.

cards.title: Traffic Count Intelligence
cards.notes: Process IDOT/AASHTO traffic count data. Trend analysis: which corridors are growing, which are declining. Alert when counts cross thresholds that justify re-evaluation. CPM optimization suggestions by site.

cards.title: Portfolio Performance Dashboard
cards.notes: Connect revenue data + traffic counts + lease terms. AI flags underperforming assets, suggests pricing adjustments, tracks renewal risk. Natural language queries: 'Show me IL sites with >15% revenue decline YoY.'

cards.title: Property Tax Appeal Preparer
cards.notes: Annual run: pull county assessor data, find comparable lower assessments, auto-draft appeal letters. Saves legal fees and flags easy wins across portfolio.

cards.title: Construction Progress Tracker
cards.notes: Photo series of active billboard construction â†’ AI estimates % complete, flags delays vs permit timeline, auto-alerts when structure should be sales-ready.

cards.title: Competitor Board Intelligence
cards.notes: Street-view / field photos of competitor boards â†’ AI reads advertiser names, estimates occupancy rate, tracks rotation changes over time. Dashboard of competitive landscape by market.

cards.title: Zoning Opportunity Monitor
cards.notes: âœ… PRODUCTION COMPLETE. Weekly monitoring of Chicago, Rosemont, Franklin Park planning agendas. GitHub Actions + gog email delivery. NEXT: Set GitHub secrets (ANTHROPIC_API_KEY, EMAIL_TO), run workflow_dispatch test.

cards.title: Test pilot deployment
cards.notes: REPO: https://github.com/phluffhead26/zoning-opportunity-monitor (PRIVATE). NEXT: Set GitHub secrets, run workflow_dispatch test, verify email delivery.

cards.title: Expand to additional municipalities
cards.notes: Add scrapers for: Schaumburg, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Skokie, Niles, Des Plaines.

cards.title: Data Center Land Scout (BTS Opportunities)
cards.notes: Find raw land with data center potential BEFORE it's obvious. NOT build-to-suit development â€” we find the dirt and market it to developers who do BTS. Targets: good power potential (transmission lines, substation proximity), contiguous parcels for assembly, contingent agreements. SEPARATE from OUTFRONT work.

cards.title: Research land scout data sources
cards.notes: ComEd transmission maps, IDOT utility permits, EIA power plant data, parcel tools (Regrid, LandGlide), county assessor APIs. Different stack than billboard work.

cards.title: Morning Digest (7 AM daily)
cards.notes: Weather, world news, AI news, image gen news, proactive step, fun fact, quote, x-factor, system status. Images of the Day in #ai-image-lab: Abstract + Bachelor Pad Wall Art + Babe of the Day. Tools: Grok Imagine (primary).

cards.title: Daily Business Idea â€” $2K Challenge (8:30 AM)
cards.notes: One clever internet business idea per day. Must be AI-automatable, <$500 startup, scalable. Target: $8-9K total (RTX 5090 PC + Mule Resonator Guitar). Format: Problem â†’ Solution â†’ Automation â†’ Revenue â†’ 30-day launch plan.

cards.title: Knowledge Base Weekly Review (Sundays 6 PM)

cards.title: Quick Capture System (Voice/Text â†’ Command Center)
cards.notes: Voice or text from anywhere â†’ transcribe â†’ categorize â†’ add to Command Center. Best option: Discord DM (free, already set up).

cards.title: Meeting Prep Automation
cards.notes: 15 min before each calendar event: pull last email thread with attendees, check Command Center for related tasks, summarize shared docs, suggest 2-3 smart questions.

cards.title: AI Expert Content Pipeline
cards.notes: Screen record tool demos â†’ 60-90 sec highlight edits â†’ leadership context writeup â†’ post to internal Slack/Teams. Monthly AI Wins summary.

cards.title: Competitive Intelligence Dashboard
cards.notes: Expand Zoning Monitor: IDOT permit filings (competitor activity), municipal agendas for 'billboard'/'sign ordinance', regulation change alerts. Weekly Market Activity digest.

cards.title: Family Firewall (Dad Mode)
cards.notes: Evenings + weekends: non-urgent work queues until morning. 'Dad mode' keyword = pause all non-critical alerts.

cards.title: Fix gog email (keychain â†’ file-based keyring)
cards.notes: Switched to file keyring (gog auth keyring file). NEXT when at computer: export GOG_KEYRING_PASSWORD=yourpassword && gog auth add buckbot.claw@gmail.com --services gmail. Then email works headless.
